comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: Number of scooters used (integer)
- y: Number of rickshaws used (integer)

Constraints:
1. 2x + 3y \geq 300 (Total number of visitors transported should be at least 300)
2. y \leq 0.4(x + y) (At most 40% of the vehicles used can be rickshaws)

Objective:
Minimize: x (Total number of scooters used)
